description:
Anastopoulo Law Firm in Florence, South Carolina, understands that a personal injury can devastate several areas of your life, including your health, finances and relationships. However, we also understand that fighting a personal injury claim can be difficult and time-consuming and that, without an adequate understanding of your rights or the law, fruitless. If, following the free initial consultation, we agree to take on your case, we will do everything in our power to take the stress out of your recovery. More than that, we will use our knowledge of the law, familiarity with the court system and reputation for success to push for nothing short of the compensation you and your family need and deserve.

Our law firm focuses exclusively on personal injury law. As a result, each attorney is well-versed with each subset of the practice area, including the following:

  • Premises liability
  • Products liability
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Animal bites
  • Medical malpractice
  • Birth injury
  • Brain injury
  • Workers' compensation
  • Wrongful death

Our intimate familiarity with the law, combined with our passion for justice, trial experience and unrelenting approach have enabled us to routinely garner multimillion-dollar verdicts on behalf of clients and their loved ones. Our top results include a $50,000,000 jury verdict, a $5,000,000 judgement and a $2,600,000 judgement. Several news sources have featured stories on Anastopoulo Law Firm and our cases, including NBC, ABC and Fox.
